tasks: Algebraic invariants of polynomial dynamical systems
results: Totally real varieties for efficient invariance checking
title:
Differential Elimination and Algebraic Invariants of Polynomial
  Dynamical Systems
abstract: Invariant sets are a key ingredient for verifying safety and other properties of cyber-physical systems that mix discrete and continuous dynamics. We adapt the elimination-theoretic Rosenfeld-Gr\"{o}bner algorithm to systematically obtain algebraic invariants of polynomial dynamical systems without using Gr\"{o}bner bases or quantifier elimination. We identify totally real varieties as an important class for efficient invariance checking.
